QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_external_objects.id odf_pk, int_external_objects.code as code, int_external_objects.obj_id as obj_id, int_external_objects.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, im_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, im_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_external_objects.im_id as im_id, int_external_objects.external_api_alias as external_api_alias, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, im_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, int_external_objects.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_external_objects.type_path as type_path, int_external_objects.obj_uuid as obj_uuid, INT_EXTERNAL_OBJECTS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_external_object.partition_code as partition_code, INT_EXTERNAL_OBJECTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, im_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_external_objects int_external_objects, int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_external_object odf_ca_int_external_object, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_integrationmappings.id odf_pk, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, odf_ca_integration_mappings odf_ca_integration_mappings where 1 = 1 and int_integrationmappings.id = odf_ca_integration_mappings.id) im_id where 1 = 1 and int_external_objects.im_id = int_integrationmappings.id and int_external_objects.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_external_objects.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_external_objects.id = odf_ca_int_external_object.id and int_external_objects.im_id = im_id.odf_pk
